They even manage to try doing the job for real, often with funny and mind-boggling outcomes!

programme.desc: In Scrapland, the characters have all been put together from various recycled household utensils. They devote their unique talents to getting ex-cash register Knight Rusty out of trouble, who thinks he's the bravest, coolest knight in all of Scrapland (but he's really a show-off with a big mouth).

programme.title: SpongeBob SquarePants S11 - EP 3
programme.desc: SpongeBob, Patrick, Squidward and the rest of the Bikini Bottom crew return for more hilarious adventures!

programme.title: My Little Pony: Friendship Is Magic S8 - EP 9
programme.desc: In the new Season 8, exciting new creatures join the Mane 6 (Twilight Sparkle, Rarity, Applejack, Pinkie Pie, Rainbow Dash and Fluttershy), including Silverstream the Hippogriff-Seapony, Smolder the Dragon and Yona the Yak, as they go on new epic adventures throughout new and familiar lands such as Mount Aris, Everfree Forest, Las Pegasus and more!

programme.title: Inazuma Eleven - EP 26
programme.desc: Mamoru End is a very talented goalkeeper and the grandson of one of the strongest goalkeepers in Japan, who died before he was born. Even though his skills are incredible, his school lacks a real soccer club as the six other members don't appear very interested even in training. The young goalkeeper sets out to find and recruit members for his soccer team.

programme.title: Make It Count S2 - EP 26
programme.desc: Maths is all about problem-solving. In this final episode, Joakim and Charlotte face the ultimate problem - getting out of an Escape Room. See how they use Maths to break codes and solve mysteries to finally break free!

programme.title: Just For Laughs Gags 19 - EP 11
programme.desc: Just For Laughs will tickle everyone's funny bone with its hilarious practical jokes, hidden camera pranks, and other creative hijinks.

programme.title: Somebody To Love - EP 3
programme.desc: How critical is a good photo or bio in someone's dating profile for a better chance at clinching a desired date? Watch Shane and Kimberly guide Ye Xiang in improving his online image and chances at being swiped right.

programme.title: Home Together - EP 5
programme.desc: (Encore) "Lion Mum" Lina Ng spills the beans on how she finds sanity and peace with her three boys studying from home during this circuit breaker period. Celebrity Chef Angela May injects her Thai heritage into her dish and songwriter JJ Neo tells us why she simply has "No Time".

programme.title: Wheel Of Fortune S37 - EP 7065
programme.desc: This game show features a competition in which contestants solve word puzzles, similar to those used in Hangman, to win cash and prizes determined by spinning a giant carnival wheel.

programme.title: The $100,000 Pyramid S4 - EP 14
programme.desc: Two contestants, each with a celebrity partner, must guess words from their partners' clues; then the roles are reversed. Winners face the pyramid.

programme.title: The Carbonaro Effect S5 - EP 15
programme.desc: Michael Carbonaro is a magician by trade, but a prankster by heart. In THE CARBONARO EFFECT, Michael performs baffling tricks on unsuspecting people in everyday situations, all caught on hidden camera. Everyone is left stunned and delighted, even though they have no idea what just hit them.

programme.title: Kin - EP 382
programme.desc: Wanting to move home and keep a closer eye on Ah Yoke, Derek seeks to defuse his scandal by publicly apologising to Eri. Nina and her siblings devise a plan to encourage Kenneth to take a big step in his life.

programme.title: News 5
programme.desc: The daily evening-news programme featuring highlights and coverage of both local and international news with a local perspective.

programme.title: In Your Living Room With PCK And Jojo - EP 1
programme.desc: Wondering how to work out when you're home? Let YES 933 DJ Hazelle Teo show you how. Also watch Class 95 DJ Sophie Gollifer teach you the 8-step method of hand-washing. Wah Banana makes us laugh with how people react to PM's circuit breaker announcement. Finally take a listen to Shabir's specially composed song - Stand Together.

programme.title: Death Is Our Business S2 - EP 7
programme.desc: 44-year-old Xavier had expressed to his wife back in the Philippines that he wished to return to a slower paced life. But they did not expect that, six months later, she will be transporting his body home.

programme.title: Race Against Pandemic
programme.desc: Lockdowns. Curfews. Quarantines. How did a coronavirus bring the world to a standstill? We delve into the science of viral outbreaks and track the world's race against the latest pandemic.

This drama describes the trials and tribulations the Teochew Cai Family under the patriarch Cai Qingyang (Kenneth Tsang) from the late 1940s to the 1990s. (重).

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 15
programme.desc: (R) Ting Xuan confesses to Wei Ren. Ji Dan Zai realises that Wei Ren does not have feelings for Jia Ying, and he gets angry because he feels anguished that Jia Ying would fall for such a man. In contrast, he tries so hard to pursue Jia Ying, but Jia Ying always avoids him instead. (PG)(重)庭萱向为人告白，为人烦恼，把事情告诉鸡蛋仔，认为自己还在办离婚，目前不适合发展新感情。鸡蛋仔见为人根本没有把嘉颖放在心上，顿时情绪爆发，心疼嘉颖怎么会喜欢上他这种人，反观自己努力追求，嘉颖却总是避开他。.

programme.title: 搜密.打卡.小红点 Little Red Dot Detectives - EP 6
programme.desc: (R) In the lively ethnic district of Little India, you can immerse in the vibrant culture and array of activities! Visit the Indian Heritage Centre to learn about the history of early Indian immigrants who moved to Singapore, savour Indian snacks, learn to make a garland and get a Henna tattoo, all at Little India! (重)小印度是新加坡著名的印度人社区，在这川流不息的地区，有着琳琅满目的商品！ 你可在印度文化遗产中心，了解小印度先祖移民的历史背景，尝一口甜腻的印度小吃，学习制作花环和做海娜手绘！让搜密主组员带领大家，一起揭开小印度的神秘面纱！.

programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 Learn Together With Me - EP 5
programme.desc: Hosted by Dennis Chew, episode 5 of Learn Together With Me teaches viewers simple stay at home physical and mental exercises, simple and nutritious recipes with DJ Violet Fenying and Chef Eric, as well as simple arts and crafts you can do at home. 第五集的《乐学每疫刻》欢乐教练将带来更多好玩的室内身心锻炼妙方。接着，一起和972 DJ粉樱以及Chef Eric Teo学习简单又有营养的食谱。诗琪老师又会教崇庆什么样的有趣美术呢？千万别错过！.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 16
programme.desc: (R) At the En Bloc Signing event, there is an air of excitement. Xiao Long and Shu Juan try to agitate the residents and influence their decision. Wei Ren is angry, and he confronts Shu Juan. Yan Xun invites the property owner to sign the document, but all of a sudden a snake appears, causing a wave of panic. Yan Xun finds out that the snake is actually a toy snake, and that Xiao Long had planned this. He becomes angered by this. (PG)(重)集体销售签名会，气氛热络热闹。小龙和淑娟在现场煽风点火，影响众业主的决定，为人气结，与淑娟针锋相对。彦勋邀请业主上前签名，不料现场出现蛇踪，引起一阵骚动。彦勋发现那其实是一条玩具蛇，由小龙暗中操控，不禁气结。.

programme.title: 小偏方大拆解 Health Hacks - EP 10
programme.desc: Body ache is a symptom of many diseases and a health warning sign. The mild recurring pain can be easily ignored and most people will choose to relieve the pain through folk remedies. Are these folk remedies really effective and what are the consequences if these remedies are used inappropriately? 疼痛是许多疾病的一种症状，也是健康的警讯。反复发作的小疼痛容易被人忽视，不少人选择通过偏方来摆脱疼痛的困扰。到底这些偏方有多少功效呢？偏方一旦应用不当，又会带来什么后果呢？.

programme.title: 聚爱圆梦 The Wish - EP 2
programme.desc: Meet the Lees - a couple who had their lives changed forever by a tragic accident. Now paralysed, Lee Hee Heng relies completely on his wife to care for him. The family needs help to fulfil Hee Heng's wish, but they must overcome the challenge of cleaning up their cluttered home. All is not lost! Follow The Wish team as they help the Lees transform their living space. 李氏夫妇因一场不幸事故而永远改变了他们的生活。李喜敬现在瘫痪了，得完全依靠妻子照顾他。 喜敬的家人需要援助以实现喜敬的愿望，但他们得先接受杂乱的住家打扫清洁的挑战！让我们看 "聚爱圆梦" 团队如何帮助李氏夫妇改变他们的生活空间。.

programme.title: 118 S2 - EP 111
programme.desc: (R) En Jia pleads with Shan Shan to support Ah Niang's dream of becoming a fashion designer. Shan Shan says that Ah Niang is the one who gave up on the dream, leading En Jia to suggest that Ah Niang only did so to not worry others. En Jia strongly believes that Ah Niang will be able to succeed, and hopes that Shan Shan can convince Ah Niang to meet her boss. (PG)(重)思嘉请求姗姗支持阿娘追求当服装设计师的梦想，姗姗说决定放弃的是阿娘，但思嘉却一语道破，指阿娘可能只是为了让身边的人安心，才无奈地放弃。思嘉坚信阿娘可以实现梦想，希望姗姗说服阿娘和她老板见一面。.

programme.title: 哆啦A梦 New Doraemon - EP 176
programme.desc: (R) This animation series centres on a robotic cat from the future, Doraemon. With its various magical gadgets, Doraemon helps its master solve all kinds of problems. (重)在这系列卡通动画里，小朋友们将看到哆啦A梦 - 这只来自未来世界的机器猫，如何应用它的法宝，协助其主人大雄解决生活上的各种难题。.

programme.title: 乐学每疫刻 Learn Together With Me - EP 6
programme.desc: Hosted by Dennis Chew, Learn Together With Me teaches you the right way to wear a mask, simple apps you can use to connect with your friends, and how to do a TikTok dance. 这一集的《乐学每疫刻》将教您正确佩戴口罩的方法，还有一些能与朋友保持联系的简单应用程序，以及如何跳 好玩的TikTok 舞蹈。.

programme.title: 金曲传奇 The Legend Of Golden Music - EP 1

Fatured artistes are Pin Guan, Li Yi Jun, Jiang Mei Qi, Zhou Hui etc. (首播)主持人黄国伦带您重温令人怀念的动人旋律，唱出永恒流传的金曲。参加的歌手有品冠，李翊君，江美琪，周蕙等。.

programme.title: 甘味人生 Taste Of Life - EP 374
programme.desc: hu-Tsai, Chao and his wife have five children. Devoted all his life into developing soy sauce products, Chu-Tsai very much hopes that one of his kids can follow his footsteps and take over his business, but he also respects their own passions and aspirations. Because of their father's invention dream, the Chao brother's lives are about to change. (PG)赵居财，一生致力研发酱油产品，与妻李锦琇育有五个孩子；居财虽然希望众孩子之中有人接手经營家业，但也尊重孩子们的兴趣和志向。赵家兄弟也因为父亲赵居财的「发明梦」，人生逐渐起了变化。.

programme.title: 我的左邻右里 Dear Neighbours - EP 17
programme.desc: (R) Yu Jie manages to find Uncle Chan's old lover, and he brings Xi Yue and Uncle Chan to the Palliative Care Centre to find her. However, they realise that they are too late as she has recently passed away, and sadly there is no fate for Uncle Chan to meet her again. Uncle Chan is disappointed, and Yu Jie comforts Xi Yue as she starts crying inconsolably. Yu Jie pities her, and this ignites in his strong feelings for her. He confesses to Xi Yue. Xi Yue does not dare to accept his feelings. (PG)(重)宇捷找到Uncle Chan的旧情人，带着喜悦和Uncle Chan到临终关怀中心，不料迟了一步，对方已逝世，两人缘悭一面。Uncle Chan感失落，喜悦更是无法控制，哭倒在宇捷怀里。宇捷怜惜不已，激起对喜悦浓烈的情感，终于忍不住向她表白。喜悦不敢接受，惊慌逃离。.

programme.title: 宅人食堂 3 Gifts For Foodie S3 - EP 4

programme.title: 单翼天使 My Guardian Angels - EP 13

(重)追求自己的幸福是每个人的权利！现今社会的女人是否应该摒弃“矜持”两个字才能更靠近幸福一点？节目中将探讨女人追求幸福时的禁忌，男人与女人相亲时该注意的事项；幸福那么近却又那么远，女人要怎么把握呢？.

programme.desc: (R) China has the highest percentage of overweight in the world! 4 million obese children out of population of 14 billion population. (重)中国已经成为世界上最多肥胖人口的国家！14亿的人口中将近一亿的肥胖成年人口和四千万的肥胖儿童！肥胖病人用各种方式来减肥、减重，有的方式有效，有的方式会危及生命。他们如何度过减肥减重的日子？会经历什么样的痛苦和危险？他们能够成功吗？.

programme.title: 天上的约定 The Promise - EP 33

(PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩)杂志社记者要调查泰俊和世珍的丑闻。幼京为了阻止记者，以英淑当年勾引万才的故事做交换。报道令英淑很伤心。万才查到是幼京爆料的，激动过度，逝世。.

Daojing yanks Taizhen back onto the bridge, and Taizhen collapses. (PG-部分画面令人不安)(重)(双声道-中/韩)道京邀请海英与他的兄弟姐妹共进晚餐。饭后，道京开车送海英回家。在路上，他看到喝醉的泰振在街对面的一座桥上蹒跚而行，像是要跳桥。道京猛拉泰振回到桥上，泰振倒地晕倒。.

(PG)(双声道-中/韩)度英去世后，世娜使计让秀昌和他身边的同事认为他患上失智症，没有办法管理公司。喝醉的艾蜜莉到姜家去找胜赫，说要告诉他一个天大的秘密。世娜着急地阻止艾蜜莉。.

programme.desc: (R) Nianxia and the mysterious person saved Sidong just in time. Sidong successfully took the evidence and found out who murdered Fangxing. During the memorial service, Sidong managed to make Chuen admit to being the murderer and expose Hu Deing as the mastermind. programme.title: 非常监狱 Extraordinary Prisons - EP 7
programme.desc: (R) Osteroy Prison is located on a lush, 9 hectares island of pine trees and rocky coasts, with views of the ocean that are postcard-worthy. It feels more like a resort than jail. Will it really serve its purpose to turn high profile convicts into responsible and functioning members of society? (重)奥斯泰哈监狱位于挪威西南部，是一座小岛监狱。这里没有高墙、没有围栏，更没有持枪的警卫。这一集的《非常监狱》将探索挪威如何以人性化的制度使囚犯们寻回良知、重新投入社会。.

In the meantime, Jingwan will stand in as chairman. Wancai's properties are willed to Youjing. Youjing is elated as she thinks she has the last laugh. (PG)(重)(双声道-中/韩) 律师在万才去世后的49天公开他的遗嘱。遗嘱写到，辉京若能拯救AP食品，就由辉京担任白道的会长，但在那之前由敬莞暂时担任会长。另外，万才的所有房产所有权归幼京。幼京见房产落入她手里，公司又由敬莞接管，开心不已。.

(PG)(双声道-中/韩)洁姿美妆召开股东大会，秀昌被解任。世娜大获全胜，计划筹备并吞洁姿美妆，并试探性地说要正韩负责。正韩在佳英和秀昌面前立刻同意，令世娜自讨没趣。秀昌误会正韩，以为他跟世娜联手搞垮洁姿美妆。.

programme.title: Setelah Terlafaznya Akad - EP 1

programme.title: Suamiku Mr Blind - EP 23
programme.desc: Aidil persuades Ain to consider to go on their honeymoon on top of his business trip. Zalia grabs the opportunity to meet Ain in person during the trip. She shares with Ain about her history with Aidil. Will Ain be able to accept the truth?

programme.title: Mak Nak Peluk Boleh
programme.desc: Tells the bitter experience that haunted Daisy after she lost her only son, Ashman due to her busy career. Daisy feels Ashman is old enough to be independent and left him alone most of the time. She regretted her past and now she does not want Syafikah to suffer the same fate.

programme.title: Cemburu Seorang Perempuan - EP 9
programme.desc: Zik is married to Erni, the love of his life. After a miscarriage that causes Erni to be infertile, Erni asked Zik to marry Dhiya, his best friend, so she can be the surrogate mother to their children. However, Erni becomes more jealous of her sister wife and starts to turn into a monster and plans to get rid of Diya in the most horrible way possible. Conflict arise between Zikri and Emillia when she feels Zikri is giving extra attention to Dhia.She believes that Dhia and Zikri are falling for each other and this was not their initial plan when Dhia married Zikri.

programme.title: #StayHomewithMe Warna - EP 9
programme.desc: Join Suharti Ali in #StayHomewithMe Warna, live!

programme.title: Sihat Oh Sihat - EP 1
programme.desc: Host: Suzairhe Sumari and Haizad ImranEpisode 1: DiabetesIn the first episode, the doctors of SOS SIHAT OH SIHAT medical hub get together with a panel of celebrity and experts to discuss the most prevalent illness amongst Singaporeans - diabetes. What are the symptoms and main causes of diabetes? Is diabetes reversible? Are there any diets that one should follow to control the sugar level in the body?

programme.title: My Coffee Prince - EP 11
programme.desc: Adapted from Korea's most popular drama series, Coffee Prince tell the story of four young people who meet together at a cafe as they navigate through love, life and their dreams.Raikal is a smart young man who hates the idea of being tied down to one career. Reluctant to join the family business, he is ordered by his grandmother to manage a cafe. Though reluctant to run the cafe, he slowly begins to immerse himself in the gourmet coffee business. Dani is heartbroken when she finds out that Mariam is actually Amri's girlfriend. She realizes who she really is and regrets coming to Mariam's Art Gallery with him.Feeling dejected, she then turns to Raikal to console her.

In the heat of the moment, Sarah reveals that Nabil is not Borhans son.

programme.title: Projek Showcase - EP 3
programme.desc: Programme is not available for live streaming. JAM is a whimsical fantasy about a man who was obsessed with striking it rich, and one day he was transported to his 'wealthy future' by a magical pocket watch given to him by an old lady.Salim is a lazy, laidback guy who is always fantasizing about striking lottery and having lots of money. He believes only money can bring him happiness. One day, an old lady gives him an antique pocket watch in return for $2.00 for lunch. The magical watch transports him to his future in two different parallel dimensions, and he learns through a painful way that money does not buy you happiness. Would he be able to get back to the present and relive his life?Salim is a lazy, laidback guy who is always fantasizing about striking lottery and having lots of money.
